attributes.action: A call for a public vote of confidence in the govenrnment
attributes.additional_details:
A demand that the people of the United Kingdom declares that we have no confidence in the Government lead by David Cameron and his Conservative party with the assistance of the Liberal Democrat party.
This  government is profoundly clueless, rudderless and without any moral fibre.
Teflon Ministers who place the blame on their political advisors (like Mr Hunt and Mrs May) rather than themselves resign for their own idiotic decisions.
A governement with neither a chancellor or chief secretary,  who have any idea about economics. Finally an education secreatary who has no idea of what is required to educate the young with the skills we need for the next 40 years.
